ingredients.item: 1 lime, juice of ½, the rest in wedges

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and add the garlic, ginger and roughly chopped white parts of the salad onions; fry over a medium heat for 6-8 minutes until fragrant. Add the fish stock and simmer for 10 minutes.

Strain the stock into a clean pan and add the soy and fi sh sauces, sugar and coconut drink, then bring to just before boiling point. Meanwhile, microwave the rice noodles and pak choi according to pack instructions.

Divide the noodles, pak choi and prawns between 2 bowls. Squeeze the lime juice into the piping hot broth and ladle over the noodles and prawns. Scatter with the sliced salad onion greens and red chilli, and serve with the lime wedges alongside.
This dish is also great with cubes of salmon (remove any skin) added to the broth along with the soy and fish sauces.
